message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations for negotiations.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your position, but $1,150,000 is already a very competitive price for this product given its true value.  I could meet you halfway at $1,100,000. This is my final offer.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still aim to keep my expenses within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,075,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations for negotiations.
